notes.title: Welcome to Note List App
notes.content: This is your first note. You can create, edit, and organize your notes here. Use categories to keep your notes organized!

notes.title: Project Meeting Notes
notes.content: Discussed Q4 goals and deliverables. Action items: 1) Finalize roadmap, 2) Schedule team sync, 3) Update documentation

notes.title: App Ideas
notes.content: Brainstorming new app features: dark mode toggle, search functionality, category filters, note export to PDF

notes.title: Edge Case: This is a Very Long Note Title That Might Break Your UI Layout If Not Handled Properly With Text Overflow
notes.content: Testing edge cases is important for robust applications. This note has an extremely long title to test text truncation and overflow handling in the UI.
